item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description:
Why Modern Science Developed in Europe?

Introduction

A question that often comes to mind is: Why has scientific progress been so significant in the past 400 years, and why did it primarily take place in Europe? The world is vast, with many ancient civilizations contributing to human knowledgeâ€”so why does modern science seem so Eurocentric? In this article, I explore the answers to these questions.
